column1: Kata Robata////If I were to rate them solely on food & drinks
column2: I would no doubt give Kata Robata 5 stars. They certainly deserve to be rated in the Houston Chronicle's Top 100 Restaurants in Houston (they were rated #11). All of the sushi and sashimi that I've had there has been tasty
column3: but it really is their epic Green Tea Cheesecake that makes me choose Kata Robata over any other sushi restaurant. I rarely order desserts at restaurants
column5: however I cannot go to Kata Robata without ordering the Green Tea Cheesecake
column6: it is SO good. Just try it...
